```{r}
person <- function(img, name, position = NULL, twitter = NULL) {
  position <- ifelse(is.null(position), "", 
                     paste0("**", position, "**"))
  twitter <- ifelse(is.null(twitter),
                    "",
                    paste0("<i class='fab fa-twitter'></i>", twitter))
  glue::glue(".person.f5[
                    .circle-image-120[
                    <img src='images/council/{img}'>]
                    {position}  
                    {name}  
                    {twitter}]")
}
```
